Introducing the whole new Samsung VR glasses

Samsung Gear VR2 Glasses

Samsung Gear VR lets you explore the virtual worlds. Explore the virtual reality world and travel deeper into immersive games with your phone in the Samsung Gear VR and its Controller SM-R325 in your hand. Put on the Gear VR headset and enjoy multiple games, TV shows, films, etc. from the Oculus Store. Whether your friend lives next door or oceans apart, the Oculus virtual rooms let you hang out with them in a more fun manner.
